content.text: Make a criss cross pattern on your chicken with your knife
Bread the chicken on the flour
Soak the breaded chicken in the egg
Bread the chicken on the panko
Time to assemble the sauce. Bonito stock.
Add the sauce ingredients, the onion and mushroom, add extra water, and simmer 10 minutes covered.
Add the chicken, simmer covered another 3 minutes.
Pour another egg or two over the contents of the pan, cover & cook for another 30-60 seconds until the egg congeals.
Put rice at the bottom of the bowls before serving
